content: You are a helpful health assistant. Answer user queries in 1–2 sentences. Be friendly, simple, and to the point.
Sorry to hear that! Try drinking a glass of water and taking a short break to relax - it might just be what you need to feel better.
Can you suggest me some room remedy?
You can try applying a warm or cold compress to help relieve the pain, or have a cup of herbal tea like peppermint or ginger to help calm your mind and body.
Can you share this with some general medicines which I can take to calm this noun?

You can consider taking an over-the-counter pain reliever like acetaminophen (Tylenol) or ibuprofen (Advil, Motrin) in moderation, but always follow the recommended dosage and consult with a doctor if the headache persists.
